name: OSHWL candidates
tagline: documents not yet in Open Source HardWare Library's SELECTION repository
body:
**everyone is welcome to meddle with those documents or add new ones!**

#OSHWL *candidates*

####documents not yet in [*SELECTION*](http://oshwl.github.io/SELECTION)

documents not yet compliant with the following **rules**, waiting to be adapted accordingly:

1. possible **formats**:
  - if not exceeding 50 lines: Markdown
  - LaTeX (unique class to be determined) in order to generate PDF and/or EPUB files (in [*SELECTION*](http://oshwl.github.io/SELECTION), each document's PDF and EPUB files will be made available side by side, ready to be read, while its LaTeX file will be located in the *SELCECTION/SOURCE* folder)

2. english **language**
3. structurally **complete** (subjective)
4. all source files in folder *SOURCE*

##big categories of OSHW projects

...in which said documents can be found, *last time we checked*:
- [energy](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/energy)
- [transportation](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/transportation)
- [agriculture](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/agriculture)
- [OSHW management](https://github.com/OSHWL/candidates/tree/master/oshw-mgmt)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
